summary: Resources for the xPack projects maintainers.

title: DEPRECATED > The GNU MCU Eclipse QEMU
DEPRECATED > The GNU MCU Eclipse OpenOCD
The GNU MCU Eclipse Windows Build Tools
The xPack Build Configurator
summary: A tool to manage project configurations, inspired by eCos CDL, but with the configuration files in JSON (in design phase).

title: The xPack Basic Project Builder
summary: A tool to build day to day projects without having to manually write make files, with an emphasis on C/C++ and embedded applications, inspired by Eclipse CDT managed builder (work in progress).

title: The xPack Build Runner
summary: A light and fast tool to build generic projects, inspired by Ninja Build but with the configuration files in JSON (in design phase).

title: xpm - the xPack Project Manager
summary: A tool to automate builds and manage dependencies for language neutral, multi-version projects, inspired by npm.

title: The xPack Build Generator
summary: An advanced tool to build complex projects, inspired by CMake, but with the configuration files in JSON and actions in JavaScript (in design phase).

title: xPack Core Tools
summary: Tools that implement the xPack core functionality.

title: Visual Studio Code xPack C/C++ Managed Build Extension
summary: Use VS Code to manage and build C/C++ projects using the xPack tools.

title: xPack Developer info
summary: Resources for xPack developers.

title: The xPack Build Box
summary: A reproducible environment for building binary xPacks.

title: The xPack Reproducible Build Framework
keywords: packages, code sharing, reusing, libraries, applications, c/c++, embedded
summary: Tools to manage, configure and build complex, package based, multi-target projects, in a reproducible way.

summary: Version 2.7.0-201610290751 is a new stable release, following the official QEMU releases.

title: GNU ARM Eclipse OpenOCD v0.10.0-20161028*-dev released
summary: Version 0.10.0-201610281609-dev is a maintenance release. It includes binaries for Windows, macOS and GNU/Linux.

title: GNU ARM Eclipse Windows Build Tools v2.7-20161028* released
summary: Version 2.7-201610281058 is a maintenance release of the GNU ARM Eclipse Windows Build Tools.

title: GNU ARM Eclipse QEMU v2.6.0-20160728* released
summary: Version 2.6.0-201607280535 is a stable release, adding support for BASEPRI, in order for RTOSes (like FreeRTOS,
>µOS++ IIIe / CMSIS++) to properly implement critical sections.

title: GNU ARM Eclipse OpenOCD v0.10.0-20160110*-dev released
summary: Version 0.10.0-201601101000-dev is a maintenance release. It includes binaries for Windows, macOS and GNU/Linux.

title: GNU ARM Eclipse QEMU v2.4.50-20151029*-dev released
summary: Version 2.4.50-201510290935 is a maintenance release, fixing the graphical rendering on macOS 10.11 and the typo related to the name of the Maple board.

title: GNU ARM Eclipse OpenOCD v0.10.0-20151028*-dev released
summary: Version 0.10.0-201510281129-dev is a maintenance release. It includes binaries for Windows, macOS and GNU/Linux.

title: GNU ARM Eclipse QEMU v2.3.50-20150816*-dev released
summary: Version 2.3.50-201508161112 is a maintenance partial release, fixing the GNU/Linux distribution.

title: GNU ARM Eclipse QEMU v2.3.50-20150805*-dev released
summary: Version** 2.3.50-201508051820** is a maintenance partial release, adding support for Windows 64-bit.

title: GNU ARM Eclipse QEMU v2.3.50-20150804*-dev released
summary: Version 2.3.50-201508041609 is a maintenance release, fixing the graphical rendering on Windows and adding support for NUCLEO-F411RE.

title: GNU ARM Eclipse QEMU v2.3.50-20150801*-dev released
summary: Version 2.3.50-201508012214 is the first production release of the
>GNU ARM Eclipse QEMU. It supports a range of STM boards, and fully implements the user LEDs available on these boards, presenting them graphically, in real time animation, over the board picture.

title: GNU ARM Eclipse Windows Build Tools v2.6-20150715* released
summary: Version v2.6-201507152002 is a new release of the GNU ARM Eclipse Windows Build Tools, adding support for Windows 64-bit.

title: GNU ARM Eclipse OpenOCD v0.9.0-20150519* released
summary: Version 0.9.0-20150519* is a new release; the just released stable version of OpenOCD (0.9.0) is now also available as ready to install, platform specific, binary files.

title: GNU ARM Eclipse QEMU v2.2.92-20150404*-dev released
summary: Version 2.2.92-20150404*-dev is the initial release of the

>GNU ARM Eclipse QEMU. It is mainly a technology preview (most of the supported boards are present, but functionality is limited and only projects created with the generic Cortex-M3 template are supported).
